scripts.postinstall: export SENTRY_LOG_LEVEL=debug && cp sentry.properties /tmp/sentry.properties && cat /tmp/sentry.properties && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client -- ../server/eb/customize/webpack.config.js && make copy-client-assets && rm -rf client/node_modules && make -C server/eb build && unzip -o ~/server/eb/artifact.zip -d ~/
